Reviews.Title: Perfect Product!
Reviews.Author: Idelette Remy
Reviews.Content: I love my HP ENVY TouchSmart..The Specs are exactly what I desired for my daily tasks. Great Product! Very please with my purchase. I would recommend it to heavy computer users.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core i7-4700MQ 2.40 GHz with Turbo Boost Technology up to 3.40 GHz; Windows 8.
16-Inch diagonal HD BrightView LED-backlit (1366 x 768), 10-finger multi-touch support
8GB DDR3 1600 MHz / 750GB 5400 RPM HDD
Beats Audio quad speakers and two subwoofers; HP TrueVision HD webcam
4 USB 3.0 (1 with sleep and charge) • HDMI • Headphone output/Microphone input combo • RJ-45 (10/100/1000)
ProductInfo.Name: HP ENVY TouchSmart 15-j052nr 16-Inch Touchscreen Laptop (Intel Core i7-4700MQ processor, 8GB DDR3memory, 750GB HDD, Windows 8)
